version_description: iPad launch crash fix

Mixgram™ - 4.0 MAJOR UPDATE

Welcome to Mixgram, the Perfect All-in-One Photo Editor! The entire app has been redesigned from the ground up to offer everything you could wish for in photography. Find all of the newest and most popular features like Stickers, Collage, Frames, Beauty Camera, Fonts and full variety of Professional Editing Tools.

COLLAGE
- Combine up to 100 photos in a single frame
- 215 New stylish Layouts
- Newly designed collage making option

TEXT
- Add text to photo redesigned
- Supports multi-line texts
- Adjust paragraph alignment and text size easily

STICKER
- Added 300+ New Stickers

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Full Supports Japonaise, Chinese, Vietnamese, Malay, Spanish, Italien and Turkish languages

# We will continue to make you smile with all the awesome features. You would be missing out way too much if you delete the app. Look forward to amazing future updates you'll love, as we listen to and care about every single one of your voice!

Follow us on Instagram: @MixgramApp

Mixgram Designer
Much Love

Much Love
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What's new:
*Cool stickers in this update!
*Improvements to collage options
*Bug fixes and performance improvements
*Mixgram stickers are available in iMessage with iOS10! Open the "Messages" app and have some fun sending Mixgram stickers in your iMessage chats!
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Merry Christmas & Happy new year! Capture and share your best moments with Mixgram!

◉ Every Collage has been crafted carefully to feel and look alive by adding intuitive controls and completely customizable designs.
◉ We have improved the Text Editor tool and added 40 new filters to be applied instantly to photos and collages.
◉ Bug fixed and system optimized to bring you the best user experience!

Thanks for being a part of the Mixgram Community! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Thanks for being a part of the Mixgram Community! Tag @mixgramapp in your stories for your chance to be featured.

We love hearing your ideas and feedback. If you have any suggestions, send us a message on Instagram or facebook.

Update to the latest version for access to our newest templates, fonts, and many other tools. In this update, you’ll find :

NEW STICKERS MAKER TOOL:
Mixgram’s Cutout Tool lets you make & share custom stickers. You can use the custom stickers by adding them to your pictures, saving them to your Mixgram collection & sharing them via iMessage.

Custom Collage:
Easily create and save your own collage template with the new Custom Collage tool.

Custom aspect ratios
Choose any image size and save it to mixgram to be used for you collages and posters.

- Support Dark Mode or Night Mode.
- Export to Instagram and Facebook stories directly from mixgram.
- 40 new insta story templates! We hope you enjoy the new minimal template collection. 


We love hearing your ideas and feedback. If you have any suggestions, send us a message on Instagram or facebook.

If you love Mixgram, don’t forget to leave a review :)

We have some exciting updates! We added support for video and animated collages, You can now combine photos and videos to make video collage, You can also add music to bring your collages to life.

New summer templates, stickers and backgrounds have been added to the Mixgram! We've got you covered with everything, from flamingos to sunglasses, to make the best summer collages.

We continue updating templates, backgrounds and stickers, We've got you covered with beautiful designs for every moment.

We love hearing your ideas and feedback. If you have any suggestions, send us a message on Instagram or facebook.If you love Mixgram, don’t forget to leave a review :)

1 - We have some exciting updates! We added support for video and animated collages, You can now combine photos and videos to make video collage, You can also add music to bring your collages to life.
2 - New summer templates, stickers and backgrounds have been added to the Mixgram! We've got you covered with everything, from flamingos to sunglasses, to make the best summer collages.
3 - Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
We made improvements and squashed bugs so Mixgram is even better for you.

Mixgram Widgets
- Add Photo Widget and Collage Widget and decorate your home screen!

Major Bug fix
- Photos are not uploading to create a collage.
- Many other bug fixes and performance improvements.

Holidays for Days: Hundreds of new templates for holiday cards and stories. we've got all of the fun stuff you need to celebrate Christmas and New Year’s Eve.

For more fun we added support for animated Backgrounds and stickers, Ready for your Video Collages and Stories - Just in time for the holidays!

Holidays for Days: Hundreds of new templates for holiday cards and stories. we've got all of the fun stuff you need to celebrate Christmas and New Year’s Eve.

For more fun we added support for animated Backgrounds and stickers, Ready for your Video Collages and Stories - Just in time for the holidays!

We are extremely thrilled to introduce this major version of Mixgram! It’s something you’ll love.

* New home page to make browsing clearer while you scroll for inspiration.
* You can finally browse through all your collages more easily with our new "My Projects" page.
* No more worrying about someone messing up your collage once it's done! You can now save all finished collages until you decide to edit it again.
• Add amazing stickers to your photos with a totally redesigned stickers tool.
• Introducing sticker packs that make it easier to export to iMessage and WhatsApp.

We hope you love these new features and designs, because we had you in mind when we built them.

We are extremely thrilled to introduce this major version of Mixgram! It’s something you’ll love.

* New home page to make browsing clearer while you scroll for inspiration.
* You can finally browse through all your collages more easily with our new "My Projects" page.
* No more worrying about someone messing up your collage once it's done! You can now save all finished collages until you decide to edit it again.
• Add amazing stickers to your photos with a totally redesigned stickers tool.
• Introducing sticker packs that make it easier to export to iMessage and WhatsApp.

We hope you love these new features and designs, because we had you in mind when we built them.
